info.name: Teyos blues v.1.4.1
info.description: I've had it with bright lights! I must daken everything! This style covers basically everything on Furvilla in a bunch of dark blues for backgrounds. Words are made a off white in most places. Very easy on the eyes I would say.  Message TeyoOtter on furvilla for questions, comments, or simple hellos c:
info.additionalInfo:
IN VERSION 1.5 this is my big project i'm working on c:
~profiles and villager pages will not be changed by this theme anymore. This will allow custom css to no longer be messed up by my colors.
~Adding some color back into the names! Trying to get the village symbols to display their proper colors
~Optimizations and labels. My code is a mess x.x
~Furvilla banner in the background at the top. Honestly, it looks really bland with out it.
THINGS I WANT THAT MIGHT NOT MAKE IT...
~Options when installing this theme! Maybe you don't want blue :o
(to be honest, that might be a different theme...)
~Hovering over things not being a bright blue
~weird blue bar at the bottom of the page must go away! 

v1.4.1 There's not much here...
~Fixed the villager page tiles again. less white c:
~broke something somewhere. it should be white again... or like a greenish color cause its text. 

v1.4 Oh man another update already? next one will be next month D:
~fixed trading tab. (should be completed c:)
~fixed redness of diseases you get all the time! 
~giving tree brightness destroyed.
~removed custom font (was causing issues with profile css)
~fixed some counters. They should all look the same gradient now.
~finally fixed stall search dropdown menu.
~all hovering locations should be a darker shade of blue now. (except for general hover. its still white x.x)
~buying currency is more blue now.


v1.3 Update tiiiimmmmeee!
~New furvilla dropdowns already match the theme <3
~fixed borders in the inventory (counter seems to still change on hover. Oops)
~Quests match the theme
~striped tables are now two shades of blue instead of one.
~trading tab subject line in a new trade is no longer white
~Improved compatibility with custom profile css (slightly)

v1.2 Mooore white destroyed!
~Minipets no longer have white background
~The area you set prices in your shop are no longer white
~More borders are now a neon blue instead of the normal one.
~Herbalist harvest pop up is no longer bright

v1.1 A few more things I found have been added to the list of darkness. this is a small update but probably a needed one.
~PM's now have a dark background
~A few more borders now go to a neonish blue when you hover your mouse over them
~Currency transfers are now blue
~Keyframe animation tests work through stylish. I did not know this previously c:
~Chat rooms are beautiful now


Known issues:
~Breaks some custom profile css
~currency transfer dropdown between furcash and furdollars is still white
~inventory counters change to vanilla hover blue when hovering on certain items.
~hovering over stripped things and forum topics is still white.
